name: Lighter Souls
description:
“As I return these gifts, I shall remember the burden I felt carrying to protect those, and now I want to accept the truth of my strength, alone but not alone.” – Knight.                                                         
  • WASD /  Arrow Keys to move around
  • Space to jump and advance dialogue
  • J to swing sword
  • S / Down Arrow to crouch
  • S + Space / Down Arrow + Space to crouch dash

                                                   

                               

Lighter Souls brings you in a world where you play as a knight who has been blessed by all these gifts of equipment to give you ultimate strength. However, you cannot help but feel the heavy burden of keeping the gifts.

Grateful for the help, you decide to turn back and return the blessed equipment.

“If not for these gifts... dare I ask, am I truly strong enough to protect those I care about?" the knight contemplates to himself.

And so, starts your journey to return the equipment you gained.  

                                                        

Download the game by clicking on the download button.

Locate the downloaded .zip file and extract the contents to a folder of your choosing.

Now simply go into your newly extracted folder and run the LighterSouls.exe file.

The game should now open and run, full-screened. Enjoy!

Sound will be zero by default, just go to settings to change it :)
